name: Camie
text: On Play: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and reveal up to one (Fishman) or (Merfolk) type card other than [Camie] and reveal it, then put it in your hand. Then, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and reveal up to one (Fishman) or (Merfolk) type card other than [Camie] and reveal it, then put it in your hand. Then, put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
